channel.title: 3 Projects | THREAD UPDATED: MARCH 10 (View Project 3; ANYONE Can Join)
channel.description:
Ok thanks everyone got that down..
[size=20pt][b][i][u]RuneRemix[/u][/i][/b][/size]
My projects are: 1.Main RR base 2.Scratch ge 3.Czar with performance upgrades (releasing soon)
[b][i]1. Current RR Base[/i][/b] Im going to start implementing some scripting for skills ect. Wish me luck and if anyone could help it would be great. Looking for staff when its up.
[i][b]2. Scratch[/b][/i] For my own [u]learning purposes[/u] A development thread's only purpose isnt to 'recruit help' Im just gonna show my development with it and, if anyone has any nice comments then cool.
[b][i]3. CZAR or Somones Source..[/i][/b] Anyone can join the CZAR just post. And u can have a copy and also debate wether it gets realeased or not. Might be developing this under a different name not sure.. DAM im freakin bored and i just want to make a basic server with some ppl lol. Anyone interested just post or w.e Lets get started!
[b][i]ALSO[/i][/b]
Im gonna make an webBased mmo soon. Yes has to be web-based sorry u dont like that fuh-Q. If anyone is good with shockwave and or DIRECTOR (WOOOT) and doesnt feel like spending $999.99 Holla. Their will be a small fee but you get payed for your input so yea.

item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

xEnt:

Now you are up to handling the protocol, building packets, sending them and receiving them, figuring out their data types, offsets and what they are for, i highly doubt you’ll get much further from here unless you copy/paste some other server code.

Yea the hole player login is just one big annoyance.
As soon as i get it down its gravy from there…

And @ ranger that is xp =o

Read full topic
